Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.Map

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(double x, double y, java.lang.String tileListPath)
      Constructs a map at position (x,y) and loads the corresponding TileList from tileListPath
